name: Champion Cheese Potatoes
author: R.G.
instructions: Pierce potatoes with a fork several times. Bake in a preheated 350Â° oven for 11/2 hours. Cut in half lengthwise and scoop out insides into a medium bowl. Mash with a fork. Add cheese and onion. Mix well. Spoon equal amounts of mashed potato back into the skins. Re- turn to oven and bake 10 minutes.
